thumb.title: 【オリジナル曲】Lazy Girl./丼ちゃん騒ぎfeat.GUMI
thumb.description: 夜じゃなくても。歌詞Love at first sightOnly see you at nightYot are someone's lover every day.Yot are so cutie smile, sexy body, the way tease me,I'm completely captivated.She said, I am Tuesday's lover. I'll get hurt...Don't you say once a week, I want to see you every day.I wanna Lazy girl, I want you to be only mine.You can come anytime if you feel anxious.I see tell more, I see tell more, Give me a call night.Ah hold me tight! Night and day...Tomorrow you"ll be someone's lover.Hey, can I still be your lover tomorrow?I wanna Lazy girl, I want you to be only mine.You can come anytime if you feel anxious.I see tell more, I see tell more, Give me a call night.Damn, it down! Night and day, I want...I wanna Lazy girl, I want you to be only mine.Come anytime, even if you're not anxious.You look just night cool take me, I heed key tell you.Bad kind of mind, nah, I know she get kick tick it now story.Vocal:GUMI 作詞/作曲:丼ちゃん騒ぎ X→https://x.com/donchansawagi_P イラスト:宇都宮様 X→https://x.com/utuutsu?s=21&t=ehudmH9SH6DeEDfBEI3sdw piapro→https://piapro.jp/sakakidani
